rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports confirmed cases using neutral language.
The segment reports factual confirmation of cases.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports confirmation of cases but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports confirmed cases by departments, not capability or preparedness.
